title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - When performing 'copy package' in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, the destination is not set correctly. Steps to reproduce: 1. Select a package in the project 2. Choose 'Copy' from the context menu.
OB: The 'copy package' functionality does not correctly set the destination package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
EB: The destination package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui should be set correctly when performing 'copy package'.
SR: To reproduce the issue, create a new project and select a package. Choose 'Copy' from the context menu and ensure that the destination package is set correctly.
